alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL AND WESTERN JIM WELLS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rios, or 9 miles northwest of Premont, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Concepcion, Ramirez, Rios, and Cruz Calle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
